text: Robert Braber (born 9 November 1982) is a Dutch footballer who currently plays for Helmond Sport in the Dutch Eerste Divisie. ==Club career== His former clubs are NAC Breda and Helmond Sport. Braber moved from Excelsior to Swansea City in the Coca Cola Championship on 22 June 2009 on trial and signed then a one-year contract with FC Ingolstadt 04 on 3 July 2009. In summer 2016, Braber returned to former club Helmond Sport.Robert Braber voor twee seizoenen naar Helmond Sport - Helmond Sport ==Honours== ===Club=== RKC Waalwijk: *Eerste Divisie: 2010–11 ==References== ==External links== * Voetbal International profile * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Rotterdam Category:Association football midfielders Category:Dutch footballers Category:SBV Excelsior players Category:NAC Breda players Category:Helmond Sport players Category:FC Ingolstadt 04 players Category:RKC Waalwijk players Category:Willem II (football club) players Category:Eredivisie players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:3.
